title: Smart Data Models - RAMI4.0 Asset Administration Shell -AAS- Generic schema
description: Based on IDTA-01001-3-0, describes a generic Asset Administration Shell - AAS - tree, component of the RAMI4.0

type.description: Property. It has to be RAMI4.0 I4AAS NGSI Entity type to represent a RAMI4.0 AAS Digital Twin

refI4AssetId.description: Relationship. References the root Asset linked to this AAS

hasDataSpecification.description: Property. Data specification defines the additional attributes an asset may have. RAMI4.0 specification

type.description: Property. Link, url or descriptionof the specified data

asset.description: Property. The Asset descripton is filled here

local.description: Property. It defines whether the asset is created locally or globally

value.description: Property. Here comes the id pointing to the definition of asset

index.description: Property. Index encodes the position in the original sequence

idType.description: Property. Type of the Identifier, eg.IRI or IRDI

submodels.description: Property. AAS contains complex set of informations, submodels provide a separate category for this complex data

items.description: Property. It clearly identify the attribute of data

local.description: Property. It defines whether the submodel is created locally or globally

value.description: Property. The id of the submodel pointing to the definition of the Submodel

index.description: Property. Index encodes the position in the original sequence

idType.description: Property. Identity information that unambiguously distinguishes one submodel from another one. Can be IRI or IRDI

conceptDictionaries.description: Property. The Asset itself can also define its own dictionary that contains semantic definitions of its submodel elements. These semantic definitions are called concept descriptions (ConceptDescription or concept dictionary). This array will contain ref ids to RAMI4.0 specific concepts used within this model

type.description: Property. Link, url, reference or description of the specified I4.0 concept

identification.description: Property. Identification of the AAS for the asset. RAMI4.0 environment

idType.description: Property. Type of the Identifier, eg.IRI or IRDI

id.description: Property. Identity information that unambiguously distinguishes one AAS from another one. RAMI4.0 environmet

version.description: Property. AAS Version number is the number in line with release of specification

revision.description: Property. AAS Revision number is the number in line with release of specification

idShort.description: Property. short id is the (short) name of the ASSET ADMINISTRATION SHELL

category.description: Property. The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element

modelType.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used

name.description: Property. Description of the referenced property of the item

descriptions.description: Property. For adding detailed knowldedge about the AAS in different languages

language.description: Property. Substring identifying the language. Acronym according to ISO 639-1

text.description: Property. The Description text is filled here
